dutchsentence: De structuur van het gebouw is erg complex.
englishtranslate: The structure of the building is very complex.

dutchsentence: Ze draagt een warme, wollen sjaal om haar nek.
englishtranslate: She is wearing a warm, woolen scarf around her neck.

vietnamese: mệnh đề chính (các mệnh đề chính)
dutchsentence: In een samengestelde zin heeft de hoofdzin een onafhankelijke betekenis.
englishtranslate: In a compound sentence, the main clause has an independent meaning.

vietnamese: mệnh đề phụ (các mệnh đề phụ)
dutchsentence: De bijzin wordt ingeleid door een voegwoord.
englishtranslate: The subordinate clause is introduced by a conjunction.

dutchsentence: Zij kan heel goed de piano bespelen.
englishtranslate: She can play the piano very well.

english: to be located / to be situated
dutchsentence: Het museum bevindt zich in het historische centrum.
englishtranslate: The museum is located in the historical center.

vietnamese: đã nằm ở (số ít quá khứ)
dutchsentence: De sleutel bevond zich onder de mat.
englishtranslate: The key was located under the mat.

english: were located (plural past tense) / has/have been located (perfect tense)
vietnamese: đã nằm ở (số nhiều quá khứ)
dutchsentence: De documenten hebben zich bevonden in een kluisje.
englishtranslate: The documents have been located in a locker.
